title: Impeachment
brief_description: “Summary: traces the history of impeachment from the Magna Carta through the American Revolution, the drafting of the U.S. constitution, the impeachment of Andrew Johnson and the issues involving Richard Nixon. explains the process of impeachment of a president and examines the roles of the House of Representatives and the Senate”
